## Source: ossf-package-analysis (85736ae7368ae102434c7881aa59599a9d612a91f34c7b4f443f3604c21f60c8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'resultstore-search-client' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
